Name: Slingshot Puzzle
About the game: This game is a kind of golf and billiards fusion, just cooler. You pull the string and shoot the ball. It must get to the hole rebounding from the walls. Various setbacks and fixtures are going not to let it happen. However, with some thinking you can manage - and collect all the diamonds on the way.
